graph_title: Proportion of population satisfied with their last experience of public services
indicator_name: Proportion of population satisfied with their last experience of public services
SDG_GOAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET: Target 16.6: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 16.6.2: Proportion of population satisfied with their last experience of public services
STAT_CONC_DEF: This indicator measures levels of public satisfaction with people’s last experience with public services, in the three service areas of healthcare, education and government services (i.e. services to obtain government-issued identification documents and services for the civil registration of life events such as births, marriages and deaths)[3]. This is a survey-based indicator which emphasizes citizens’ experiences over general perceptions, with an eye on measuring the availability and quality of services as they were actually delivered to survey respondents.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 16.6: Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 16.6.2: Proportion of population satisfied with their last experience of public services

fr.SDG_GOAL: Objectif 10 : Réduire les inégalités dans les pays et d’un pays à l’autre
fr.SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Objectif 10 : Réduire les inégalités dans les pays et d’un pays à l’autre
